snippet.title: Shin Megami Tensei 2 SNES English - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Just me going from one place to another in Shin Megami Tensei 2 for the SNES.  This game is also in English thanks to a translation patch.

This video shows basic gameplay against very weak enemies.  It doesn't help that I don't know where to go to advance the story.
